item.title: IMO - TehGM's Blog
item.author: Author
item.description: Some of my blog posts are review-ish in nature - this is what I call "IMO" posts! They're not called reviews because they're fully subjective, but otherwise, they function just as that.Find out what I think about various TV shows, games, etc! Potential Spoilers Warning These posts might contain minor spoilers. I do my best to avoid any significant spoilers, but it's not always possible to 'review' something without at least tiny ones.
